page.title: .remove() - Minified.js
page.main:
back to Overview

.remove()

Removes all nodes of the list from the DOM tree.

Syntax

remove()

Description

Removes all nodes of the list from the DOM tree.

Example

Removes the element with the id 'myContainer', including all children, from the DOM tree. 
$('#myContainer').remove();

back to Overview
